edu.cmu.commons.mojos.exec
Class AbstractExecMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      edu.cmu.commons.mojos.exec.AbstractExecMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExecMojo, JavaMojo, KillMojo
public abstract class AbstractExecMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo

Goal which executes a command as a background process via a shell.

Author:
Andy Schlaikjer

Field Summary
protected  List<Object> args
          Command arguments.
protected  String classpathArgumentName
           
protected  String classpathScope
          Dependency scope to use when constructing classpath.
protected  Boolean createScriptOnly
          If true, the start script is created but not executed.
protected  Boolean fork
          If true, the start script is forked and runs independently of Maven.
protected  File logFile
          File to which all standard and error output of process will be directed.

          Name of task.
protected  File pidFile
          File where process id will be written.
protected  org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
          The enclosing project.

          The file in which to create the start script invoked by the shell.
protected  String shell

Field Detail

project

protected org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject project
The enclosing project.

shell

protected String shell
One of "bash", "cmd", or "auto". When set to "auto", the shell used to invoke the command will be determined by the OS family.

name

protected String name
Name of task. Used for default script, log and pid file names.

args

protected List<Object> args
Command arguments. If any of the arguments match the value of the classpathArgumentName parameter, then they are replaced by the classpath whose scope is specified by the classpathScope parameter.

classpathArgumentName

protected String classpathArgumentName

workingDir

protected File workingDir
The directory in which to execute shell.

scriptFile

protected File scriptFile
The file in which to create the start script invoked by the shell. Defaults to ${project.build.directory}/bin/${name}. On Windows the default script name will also include a ".bat" suffix.

logFile

protected File logFile
File to which all standard and error output of process will be directed.

pidFile

protected File pidFile
File where process id will be written.

classpathScope

protected String classpathScope
Dependency scope to use when constructing classpath.

createScriptOnly

protected Boolean createScriptOnly
If true, the start script is created but not executed.

fork

protected Boolean fork
If true, the start script is forked and runs independently of Maven. Otherwise, Maven will wait for the command to terminate before continuing.
